jobs.title: Data Scientist I
jobs.description:
Job Description:
Swiggy is hiring for the position of Data Scientist I in Bengaluru, Karnataka, India. The role involves applying Machine Learning (ML) and Deep Learning (DL) techniques to solve business problems
in the e-commerce and logistics domain.
Responsibilities:
Develop and apply ML/DL models to address business challenges.
Work with large datasets ( big data ) and deploy ML/DL models in production.
Formulate and solve problems using first-principles thinking.
Collaborate with teams to enhance data-driven decision-making.
Communicate insights effectively through strong verbal and written skills.
Requirements:
Education: Bachelor's or Master's degree in a quantitative field.
Experience: 0-2 years in industry or research labs.
Technical Skills:
Strong problem-solving abilities.
Hands-on experience with ML/DL and statistical techniques.
Proficiency in Python, SQL, Spark, TensorFlow.
Experience in e-commerce and logistics (preferred).
Knowledge of Generative AI (preferred).
Way of working - Remote: Employees will have the freedom to work remotely all through the year. These employees, who form a large majority, will come together in their base location for a week, once every quarter.
